title: Sample Book (France), 1938
medium:
Medium: wool, silk, linen, cotton
Technique: printed and woven
description: Two hundred and eighty-two samples of wool, silk, linen, and cotton fabric: one hundred seventy-nine wool woven designs; four wool and linen designs; four embroidered wool designs; four printed silk and wools designs; twenty-six knitted wool design; six knitted silk designs; twelve printed silk novelty designs; eight linen and silk designs; five printed linen designs; and five plaid cotton designs. Samples are accompanied by fourteen colored costume sketches suggesting use for fabrics. Samples are bound in a white cloth-covered binder with "Rodier" in large red and black celluloid letters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book (France), 1938. Medium: wool, silk, linen, cotton
Technique: printed and woven. 
Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1938-74-56
